description: Donald Trump was born in Queens, New York, on June 14, 1946. He grew up in Jamaica Estates and attended the Kew-Forest School. His father, Fred Trump, was a successful real estate developer, which influenced Donald's future career.
After completing his undergraduate education in 1968, Trump began his business career by investing in Philadelphia real estate. This marked the start of his ventures in the real estate industry.

In 1970, Donald Trump moved his focus to Manhattan, where he became known for developing glitzy projects in the area. He continued to expand his real estate empire and business ventures in Manhattan throughout his life.

Trump purchased Mar-a-Lago in Palm Beach, Florida, in 1985. This property became one of his prized possessions and served as a private club and residence. He spent considerable time at Mar-a-Lago during his life.
